snippet: Investors seem to think there may be more than $85 million a year in potential savings or other sources of new profit in a merger of Jos. A. Bank and Men’s Wearhouse.
abstract: Investors seem to think there may be more than $85 million a year in potential savings or other sources of new profit in a merger of Jos. A. Bank and Men’s Wearhouse.

headline.main: A Deal That Needs Some Special Tailoring
